meanings.sent1: The train was imminently approaching the station, causing passengers to gather their belongings.
meanings.sent2: She knew her deadline was imminently close, so she worked quickly to finish her project.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's imminently funny joke had the audience roaring with laughter.
